combine.1: Get out of here, /player/. This area isn't safe.
combine.2: Identify yourself and state your purpose, /player/.
combine.3: Keep your eyes open, /player/. Resistance could be nearby.

resistance.2: Watch your back, /player/. Combine patrol just passed by.
resistance.3: /player/, we need to figure out how to get more supplies.
resistance.4: How's it going on your end, /player/?

union.2: The capitalists are squeezing us dry again, /player/.
union.4: They're late with our pay again, /player/. Got any ideas?

warlord.4: Stay sharp, /player/. Someone's eyeing our turf.

church.1: May Gary the Rat bless you, /player/.
church.2: Have you felt the Lord's guidance lately, /player/?

bandit.2: Be careful, /player/. The cops are cracking down hard.
bandit.3: We need to find a new hideout, /player/.
bandit.4: I'm a bit short on cash, /player/. Know any good money-making schemes?
bandit.5: Don't trust anyone, /player/. Not even me.

other.2: This area isn't safe, /player/. Watch yourself.
other.4: Didn't expect to see you in /map/, /player/.
other.5: Don't let the rules tie you down, /player/.

combine.1: Stay alert, the Resistance could be anywhere.
combine.2: Any breach of discipline will be severely punished.
combine.4: This place is so boring, I can't wait to get back to base.
combine.5: Anyone got some military gum? I'm feeling sleepy.
combine.6: This patrol route is so long, when will it end...
combine.7: That damn floor last night left my back aching.

resistance.1: Running low on ammo, gotta conserve... Hope supplies arrive soon.
resistance.2: This damn gun jammed! Anyone got spare parts?
resistance.3: Hey, seen my gas mask anywhere?
resistance.4: Stay sharp, the Combine could counterattack any moment.
resistance.5: I'm so sick of these canned rations, I'd kill for some fresh veggies.
resistance.6: Anyone got a light? I need a smoke to relax.
resistance.7: Who's on watch tonight? I need some proper sleep.
resistance.8: This crappy radio only picks up Combine propaganda, I wish we could hear real news.
resistance.9: Hey, you ever play those old arcade machines at Black Mesa? Now that was classic!
resistance.11: This damn weather is freezing, I could use a thick coat.
resistance.12: Anyone got cards? Let's play a few hands to kill time.
resistance.13: This coffee tastes awful, but it's better than nothing.
resistance.14: Hey, you hear? There's a new bar opening underground in City 17.
resistance.15: One day, we'll make the Combine pay for their crimes!
resistance.16: We're not alone in this fight, the whole world supports us!
resistance.17: This damn map is so confusing, where the hell are we?
resistance.18: This place is too quiet, it's creeping me out.
resistance.19: I think I heard something strange, you guys hear that?
resistance.20: These damn boots are leaking again
resistance.21: Anyone know what time it is?
resistance.22: Careful! Don't touch my weapon, it's my lifeline!
resistance.23: Anyone got a razor? My beard's getting out of control.

union.1: The noise in this factory is giving me a headache.
union.2: My back's acting up again, they should pay me double for this.
union.3: This damn machine broke again, need to get it fixed.
union.4: Did we meet today's production quota?
union.5: These work clothes are falling apart, when are we getting new ones?
union.7: The food in this cafeteria is terrible.
union.8: Heard the factory next door went on strike, should we do the same?
union.9: The pay's too low, can't even support my family.
union.10: Those capitalists keep exploiting us, we'll show them one day!

warlord.1: This territory is perfect for a base.
warlord.2: Anyone got some booze? I need a drink.
warlord.3: This gun needs maintenance, anyone got gun oil?
warlord.4: Things are heating up lately, everyone stay alert.
warlord.6: We need to plan our next move carefully.
warlord.7: You hear that rumbling? The railway must be nearby.
warlord.8: Heard some big shot's coming here
warlord.9: Only reason I came to this backwater was for the pretty girls.
warlord.10: Fricis is the real boss of /map/, you're all dead meat!

church.1: May Gary the Rat bless us.
church.2: This holy water is miraculous, cures all ills.
church.3: Bring the candles, it's time for the ritual.
church.4: This scripture is so profound, needs careful study.
church.5: May the Lord's light shine upon this land.
church.6: The hymns of Gary the Rat bring peace to the soul.
church.7: Gear up, we need to purify this area.
church.9: May Gary the Rat forgive our sins.
church.10: Judgment Day is near, Gary the Rat will descend upon the world.

bandit.1: This spot's perfect for an ambush.
bandit.3: This piece of junk needs replacing.
bandit.4: Things are getting messy in /map/, bad for business.
bandit.5: This loot's good, should fetch a nice price.
bandit.6: We need to plan our route, who's got the map?
bandit.7: This damn heat's killing me, need to cool off.
bandit.8: Heard there's a merchant caravan nearby, let's hit it!
bandit.9: Damn, these boots are killing my feet.
bandit.10: Stay alert, enemies could show up any minute.

other.1: This place is so quiet, too bad I'm no philosopher.
other.3: My passport got stolen at the hotel!
other.4: No, actually, I think the opposite, nothing new lately.
other.5: The view here's great, I took a photo.
other.8: Heard there's a market nearby, I'm gonna check it out!
other.9: I can sleep anywhere, even with just a blanket.
other.10: Be careful, there's lots of wildlife near /map/.

combine.4: Put down your weapons or we'll shoot!
combine.8: You want to test the law?
combine.9: We've got a situation here in /map/.

resistance.4: I see them, get ready to fight!

union.8: What are you waiting for? Take cover!

warlord.2: Let's show them what we're made of!
warlord.3: This is our turf, who dares challenge us?
warlord.6: Dragons must coil, tigers must crouch.

church.2: For the glory of Gary the Rat, destroy them!
church.4: Let the Lord's wrath fall upon them!

bandit.3: If you want to live, leave your stuff!
bandit.4: We'll be rich after this job!
bandit.5: Don't let them get away, chase them!

other.2: Looks like someone's gonna bleed today!
other.3: Guess I need to stretch my muscles today!
other.4: You're messing with the wrong person, /victim/!
other.5: If you insist on fighting, bring it on!
other.6: I didn't want trouble, but you asked for it!
other.7: Don't think I'm an easy target, /victim/!
other.8: Looks like I need to teach you some manners today!

combine.3: This is what happens when you mess with the Combine, /victim/.
combine.12: Looks like /victim/ won't be seeing the inside of a cell.
combine.14: Should've thought twice before messing with us, /victim/.
combine.15: Is that the best you can do, /victim/?
combine.16: Your weapons are like toys, completely useless.

resistance.1: I won't go easy on you, /victim/!
resistance.3: Seems like you're all talk and no action, /victim/.
resistance.4: Someone's gonna have to clean up /victim/'s mess.
resistance.5: Another body in /map/, rest in peace, /victim/.
resistance.6: Haha, /victim/, better watch your back in your next life!

warlord.1: The boss will reward us for this.
warlord.2: Loot secured, let's get out of here!
warlord.4: Anyone else wanna end up like /victim/?
warlord.5: Another enemy down, our territory grows!

church.2: This is what happens to all heretics!
church.3: Lord, I offer /victim/ as sacrifice to you!
church.5: Keep going, wipe them all out.

bandit.5: Don't let them escape, after them!

other.1: Maybe you'll learn some respect in your next life, /victim/.
other.6: Hope this is the last one.
other.8: May your soul rest in peace, /victim/.

greeting.4: What have you been up to lately, /name/?
greeting.5: You seem to be in a good mood, /name/.

negotiate.1: About the border issue last time, can we compromise?
negotiate.2: I have a proposal that might benefit both of us, /name/.
negotiate.3: Things would go much smoother if we agree on resource allocation.
negotiate.4: I understand your position, but maybe we can find a middle ground?
negotiate.5: About that dispute, why don't we set aside our differences and focus on our common goals?
negotiate.6: As long as we agree on basic principles, the details will be easier to handle.
negotiate.7: If we make concessions on some details, we can reach an overall agreement.
negotiate.8: I have an idea that might break our current deadlock.

trade.1: Do you have anything special here?
trade.3: Got any good stuff for sale, /name/?
trade.4: I'd like to buy some of your things, /name/.
trade.5: Heard you've got some unique items here?
trade.6: Can I take a look at your goods?
trade.8: I'm quite interested in your products.
trade.9: Could you tell me more about your goods?
trade.11: Do you think today's deal will go well?

leave.1: Let's call it a day for now.
leave.6: I'll catch up with you later.
leave.9: I'll buy you a drink next time.

greeting.2: Nice weather today, isn't it? I was just about to visit City 17.
greeting.3: Hey, /player/! Didn't expect to see you in /map/.
greeting.4: Great to see you, /player/! I was just looking for someone to chat about recent events.
greeting.5: /player/! Perfect timing, I was just talking about you with a friend.

negotiate.1: I suggest we first define the boundaries, what do you think?
negotiate.2: Why don't we list out the key issues one by one for clarity?
negotiate.3: I completely understand your concerns, maybe we should assess the situation first.
negotiate.4: I was just about to ask for more details myself.
negotiate.5: Let's prioritize solving the most pressing issue first, other matters can be discussed later.

trade.1: Of course! I bet you'll be interested in this.
trade.2: You came at the right time, /player/, check this out.
trade.3: Speaking of goods, I've got some weapons here you might like.
trade.4: I'm just organizing new arrivals, want to see if there's anything you need?
trade.5: /player/, you always find the good stuff! How about checking out this new batch of weapons?

leave.1: Alright, /player/, feel free to drop by anytime, you're always welcome here.
leave.2: Take care, /player/! If you run into any trouble, just come find me.
leave.3: Let's catch up another time, I've got some things to take care of.
leave.4: Goodbye, /player/! Hope to hear good news from you next time we meet.
leave.5: Alright, /player/, let's talk again some other time.
